strapiEvent.name: Dance in the Grass
strapiEvent.description:
Calling ALL lovers of art, movement, exercise, nature, dance, and coffee!

Join Ozark Ballet Theater and Guest Teacher Karen Castleman in welcoming the beautiful Autumn weather! Friday Oct. 8th at 11 AM, take a lovely stroll at the Coler Preserve, find a hidden getaway featuring an Airship Coffee location and a gorgeous natural setting to experience a simple, FREE introduction to modern dance. This event is open to EVERYONE. NO experience required.

Enjoy low-impact breathing and dance exercises outdoors and then grab a tea or coffee and relax on the gorgeous Airship porch. As a bonus - all attendees will receive 15% off their Airship order!

Bring shoes you're comfortable in or go barefoot if you'd prefer! attendees are welcome to bring blankets and chairs - this is a zero-pressure session. Relax, have fun, sit down and follow with your arms if you'd like, just get moving with us on a Friday morning! We will gather at 11 and get started by 11:15

Ozark Ballet Theater is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit with a mission to improve access to professional quality dance training throughout Northwest Arkansas. While this event is offered for free to the public, we are suggesting a donation of $8 to cover our event expenses.

Follow us on Facebook and Instagram and Subscribe to our mailing list at www.obt.dance to keep up with our diverse free program offerings!

Please pre-register online at www.obt.dance/Modern

Donate To OBT! Visit www.Givebutter.com/OBT
